title: kafeelniazi
author: kafeelniazi
content: ★★ COINTELEGRAPH USA Contributor/Profile [Publish on Cointelegraph.com] [Ranks Well on Google] [Network With Top Leaders] [Ideal for NFT/Crypto Founders & Executives]★★Cointelegraph community provides a secure environment for members to meet and have important conversations about blockchain technology, cryptocurrency, alternative assets, NFTs, and Web3.Want to get your case evaluated by our team so we can get you a contributor spot on Cointelegraph? PM me with your social media URLs including LinkedIn, previous articles, and more!BENEFITS:picture host-Get a Cointelegraph profile (ranking really good on Google): SAMPLE-Publish expertise articles on Cointelegraph: SAMPLE -Get multiple mentions and quotes published on Cointelegraph by participating in Expert Panels every month: SAMPLE -Complimentary membership for yourself and 2 executives in EXEC, a highly curated hotel, travel, lifestyle, and business benefits program (JoinEXEC.com)-Get access to Cointelegraph CMS and forums to network with other members and founders-Get high-touch editorial and concierge suppor-Get official banners, letters, and badges to use on social media, emails-Attend curated events in-person-Access exclusive brand partnershipspicture hostRULES:-We DO NOT usually operate with previously denied cases. If you’ve tried to join Cointelegraph on your own and got rejected, PM us for more information, but we prefer to work with clean cases from scratch for higher success rates.-Not all clients are relevant enough to get a contributor spot and profile on Cointelegraph.com 1. We reserve the right to refuse service to certain individuals.FAQ:Will I be able to publish articles mentioning other people and companies?Ideally, the articles you will be posting need to be related to your experience and expertise in your industry and others related.However, you can once in a while promote your own company and if it’s well-made and you get an internal approval, you can do mentions to well-known people and also other members that are part of the Cointelegraph community.Price: $5500 USD (DISCOUNTED PRICE, LIMITED SPOTS)Disclaimer: Cointelegraph community itself will charge a fee of $2,650 USD for 1 year or $4,500 USD for 2 years plus a non-refundable initiation fee of $600 when setting up your account and profiles. These fees are separate from ours and are paid directly to them on their platforms.TAT: 1-2 weeks usuallyCONTACT:LinkedInTELEGRAMPayment Method: USDT, BTC, ETHESCROW accepted

comments.author: kafeelniazi
comments.body: Limited Spots are about to full, Grab your chance!
